dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare approach me, pitiful creature?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. Can we talk?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? You reek of weakness. Speak quickly!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge, not conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Your ignorance is astounding. What do you want?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I wish to learn about the arcane arts.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmph, you think you have the potential? Prove it or leave!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for bothering you. I will leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should. Be gone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a duel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You think you can defeat me? Foolish mortal!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no desire to fight. I will leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: That's right, run away like the coward you are!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare yourself! The duel begins now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Prepare to be crushed!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense great power within you. Let us join forces.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? Why would I ally myself with a weakling like you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will leave you be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Finally, some sense. Leave and never return!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you my allegiance. Together, we can be unstoppable.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Your allegiance means nothing to me. Prepare to face my power!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to be insulted. State your business or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Oh, a defiant one. I like that. Let's see if you can back it up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I warn you, do not test my patience.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Patience? I have none for weaklings like you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not engage in petty squabbles. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good riddance. Don't let the door hit you on the way out!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough talk. Let our actions speak for us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. Prepare for a battle you will never forget!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see no reason to continue this conversation. I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leaving so soon? I was just getting started with you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your threats hold no power over me. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: We'll see about that. Leave before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I choose not to engage with the likes of you. Goodbye.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. I have no time for cowards like you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a dark aura around you. What do you intend?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Dark aura? How observant of you. Perhaps you are not as foolish as you seem.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand your purpose in this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My purpose is none of your concern. Begone, before I decide to crush you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well. I will leave you to your mysterious ways.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice. Leave before you regret crossing me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be intimidated. Face me if you dare.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words. Let's see if you can back them up!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense a troubled past. Let me help you find peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? I have no need for such trivialities. Leave me be.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Understood. I will respect your solitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Finally, some sense. Leave before I decide to end you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You cannot ignore the darkness within you forever. Let me aid you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Aid me? You are amusing. Prepare to face the consequences of your words!
